name: WhistlePig 12 Year Bespoke 100% Amburana East Side pick
description: East Side restaurant in Denton, TX has an extensive whiskey selection. This 12 Year Bespoke Rye was finished in 100% Amburana (Brazilian Teak wood) casks.

name: WhistlePig 10 Year East Side pick
description: East Side restaurant in Denton, TX has an extensive whiskey selection. This is a cask strength single barrel selection.

name: WhistlePig Ginger Fashioned Cocktail To-Go
description: Barrel-aged ready to drink WhistlePig PiggyBack Old Fashioned made with Runamok maple syrup infused with raw ginger.

description: Barrel-aged ready to drink WhistlePig PiggyBack Old Fashioned made with Runamok maple syrup infused with orange essence.
